function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Non-contact interaction activities may have varying degrees of impact on different types of service facilities within the community, leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within the community due to the varying effects of non-contact interaction activities on different types of facilities.","Mitigation":"Conduct targeted research on different types of facilities to understand the impact of non-contact interaction and optimize the configuration of community service facilities to minimize disease transmission risk.","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling tools for understanding interaction patterns, and architectural and urban planning software for optimizing facility configuration.","People":"Community residents, facility users, and staff at the service facilities.","Owner":"Community planners, urban designers, architects, and public health officials."}]}
